special_rules.title: "Placeholder"
special_rules.description: This is the default army list used to build others from.

special_rules.title: Tactica: The Bitter End
special_rules.description: If the Controlling Player is making a Leadership Check or Cool Check for a Unit that includes a majority of Models with this Special Rule, they may ignore negative modifiers applied by the Panic (X), Pinning (X), Stun (X) or Suppressive (X) Special Rules.

special_rules.title: Gambit: Spiteful Demise
special_rules.description: When this Gambit is selected, if this Model loses its last Wound during the following Strike Step, the Controlling Player may choose to immediately inflict a single automatic Hit on the opposing Model, resolved as if it was made with the following Weapon: IM:I, AM:1, SM:6, AP4, D2, Breaching (5+).

special_rules.title: Advanced Reaction: Bitter Fury
special_rules.description: This advanced reaction may be declared in the shooting phase. The reacting unit attacked with Firepower +1 but gain the Overload (1) Special Rule.

special_rules.title: Additional Detachment: The Ironfire Cohort [Auxillary Detachment]
special_rules.description: This Auxillary Detachment contains 2 Armour, 2 Support. Armour slots must be filled with Arquitor Bombard Units.

special_rules.title: Additional Detachment: The Hammer of Olympia [Apex Detachment]
special_rules.description: This Apex Detachment contains 2 Heavy Assault, 1 Heavy Transport, 2 Troops. This detachment may only be selected if your Army also contains a Warsmith or Perturabo Unit.
